attributes.description:
USED KIA PICANTO 1.0 STREET M/T 2021 FOR SALE AT KIA CENTURION IN PRETORIA.

** 5 CARS TO CHOOSE FROM (WHITE & SILVER) MILEAGE RANGING FROM 30 000KM - 35 000KM **

Balance of 5 Years/Unlimited Km Warranty & Service Plans Available.
FEATURES Include: Dual Front Airbags, Aircon, Central Locking, Electric Mirrors & Windows, Multi-function steering, Reverse Camera, Touchscreen Radio/Mp3 player with USB port, Bluetooth.


Price excludes delivery and registration fees.
PLEASE NOTE THIS VEHICLE IS AVAILABLE FOR VIEWING AT THE LAZARUS KIA USED CAR SHOWROOM. - ABS, Air bags 2, ISO fix, Power steering, Onboard computer, Seats 5, Spare wheel SPACESAVER, Air conditioner, Electric windows, Radio, Remote side mirrors, Park distance - rear, Fuel UNLEADED, Engine TRANSVERSE INLINE 3, Engine size 998cc, CO2 118g/Km, Power 49kW@5500, Torque 93Nm@3750, DOHC, 4 VALVES PER CYLINDER, Gears 5, Drive 2, 0-100Km/h 0sec, Top speed 155Km/h, Boot capacity 200 litres, Average fuel consumption 4.9l/km, Service interval 15000km

attributes.description:
This Swift 1.2 GLX Model features a full body kit with color coded options!

The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2? petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9? / 100km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. 

 

The Swift’s floating roof design, solid shoulder lines, and rich side body sculpting unite to give you a driving experience that thrills. Its low, short, wide stance has a presence that can’t be ignored, making you stand out wherever you go. Designed to give you all the right feels, the new Suzuki Swift is a bold statement in design and style.

attributes.description:
If you are looking for a quality Pre-Owned Vehicle then look no further.  Our vehicles go through a 108 -point quality check to ensure that you are getting value for your money.  
Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.  Delivery can be arranged nationwide. Price excludes admin and delivery fee. Finance can be arranged on premises and trade- ins are welcome. We at Motus Mazda Germiston strive for perfection, so that you as the customer can make the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect vehicle to suit your needs, so please do take a stroll on our showroom floor. We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.  
You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives, to help with all your vehicle requirements.
